reasoning: The webpage contains full job details including description, requirements, responsibilities, salary, and application instructions for the Breakfast Club Supervisory Assistant position.

job_details.title: Breakfast Club Supervisory Assistant
job_details.job_description: You will support the smooth operation of our Breakfast Club, providing quality care and engaging activities for children. You will attend to pupils’ personal needs and provide general support in supervising and managing pupils, caring, and playing with groups of children, as well as providing a light breakfast. Enthusiasm and commitment is a key factor to provide a relaxed family feel breakfast environment. Horbury Primary Academy strives to create an environment where pupils enjoy learning and are given opportunity to stretch themselves both academically and also through a wide range of other extra-curricular activities.
job_details.hours: 8 Hours Per Week, Monday to Friday 7.15am to 8.50am
job_details.benefits: Membership to either the Teachers’ Pension Scheme or the Local Government Pension Scheme, Technology scheme via SmartTech, Access to an extensive discounts platform via Accord Rewards, Access to an industry leading Employee Assistance Programme, 24/7 access to an online GP or Advanced Nurse Practitioner through Corporate Paid Healthcare Cash Plans, Access to health and wellbeing services, Cycle to Work Scheme, Free annual flu jab, Free, on-site parking at every site, Trained Mental Health First Aiders in all our settings.

email.instructions: Completed application forms to be returned via email.

job_details.title: Social Worker
job_details.job_description: Come and join us! We are recruiting for a London-based social worker. The role is for three days a week but there is flexibility to spread the hours across four or five days.
job_details.hours: Three days a week, flexible across four or five days

email.instructions: For more information please email Karen Markham.
